text: (nampikkai kollata) avarkal oru manakketana kariyattaic cey(yum potu, ataik kanta evarum avarkalaik kantit)tal, avarkal ‘‘enkal munnorkalum ivvaru ceyyave nankal kantom. Melum, ivvaru (ceyyumpatiyakave) allahvum enkalukkuk kattalaiyittirukkiran'' enru kurukinranar. (Atarku napiye! Avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka allah manakketana kariyankalaic ceyyumpati evave mattan. Allahvin mitu ninkal ariyatavarrai(p poyyaka)kkuralama?'' Enru kuruviraka
